summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LinkedIn Authority Engine MVP. Backend APIs are fully functional (13/13 endpoints passing), but critical frontend-backend integration issues prevent proper application functionality.

integration_issues.issue: All API requests failing with net::ERR_ABORTED - frontend cannot communicate with backend
integration_issues.impact: CRITICAL - Settings page stuck loading, topic suggestions not loading, calendar data missing, AI generation failing

integration_issues.issue: Page stuck on loading spinner due to failed API call to /api/settings
Topic suggestions not loading due to failed /api/ai/suggest-topics call
Calendar shows empty slots due to failed /api/calendar/week call

passed_tests: Frontend calendar grid structure (7 days, 28 slots)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend-backend API integration. All API calls from frontend are failing with net::ERR_ABORTED errors. Backend APIs work perfectly when tested directly, but frontend cannot communicate with backend. Check CORS configuration, network connectivity, and API client setup. This is blocking all dynamic functionality including settings, topic suggestions, calendar data, and AI generation.
